testcase.name: Validate VIEW/EDIT/CREATE buttons are visible for the patient with their health conditions are not confirmed
testcase.system-out: Given Dietician naviagates to My Patients screen............................passed When Dietician enters patient name and clicks search button.................passed Then Patient details for the given name is displays in the My Patients screen.passed When Dietician checks VIEW PREVIOUS TEST REPORTand PLANS and CREATE NEW REPORT and PLAN and EDIT PREVIOUS REPORT and PLAN buttons.passed Then VIEW PREVIOUS TEST REPORT and PLAN and CREATE NEW REPORT and PLAN buttons EDIT PREVIOUS REPORT and PLAN buttons displays in the My Patients screen.passed

testcase.name: Validate user is able to Edit the Diet plan when the health conditions are not confirmed
testcase.system-out: Given Dietician is on My Patients screen....................................passed When Dietician clicks EDIT PREVIOUS REPORT/PLAN button......................passed Then Dietician navigates to Confirm Health conditions and Generate a new Diet plan.passed

testcase.name: Validate the health conditions and co - morbidis and preferences are preselected based on its created
testcase.system-out: Given Dietician is on Confirm Health Conditions and Generate a new Diet Plan page.passed When Dietician gets the page with pre selections of health conditionsa andCo-Morbidities and Preference.passed Then health conditions and Co-Morbidities and Preference are preselected based on the report and Menu created.passed When Dietician changes the condition and Co Morbidities and preference......passed Then changed condition and Co Morbidities and preferences appears on the screen along with the previous selection.passed

testcase.name: Confirm Health Conditions and Generate a new Diet Plan
testcase.system-out: Given Dietician is on Confirm Health Conditions and Generate a new Diet Plan page.passed When Clicks both of the confirm buttons.....................................passed Then Confirm button turns into Confirmed and authenticiated with the message Health conditions and Co Morbidities and preferences are confirmed.passed When Clicks GENERATE MENU button Diet plan..................................passed Then updated and authendicated with the message Report and Diet Plan is updated successfully.passed

testcase.name: Validate Dietician could not edit the health conditions and Diet plans for a patient has confirmed health conditions
testcase.system-out: Given Dietician navigates to My Patients screen.............................passed When Enters patient name and hit the search button..........................passed Then Patient details for the given name is displays in the My Patients screen.passed When Dietician gets VIEW PREVIOUS TEST REPORT and VIEW PREVIOUS DIET PLANS and CREATE NEW REPORT or PLAN buttons.passed Then EDIT PREVIOUS REPORT/PLAN button is not displays on the screen.........passed

testcase.name: User not a member yet of that website

testcase.classname: Sign in functionality of a dietician website
testcase.name: Sign in with invalid credentials (_ve)

testcase.classname: Sign in functionality of a dietician website
testcase.name: User try to sign in without sign up or registration
testcase.system-out: Given Unauthorised activity of user.........................................passed When User fills sign in form................................................passed Then User should get error message please register before signning in.......passed

testcase.classname: Sign in functionality of a dietician website
testcase.name: Using one valid, one invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on sign in page...............................................passed When User enters valid username with incorrect password.....................passed Then User should get error message please enter valid password..............passed When User enters invalid username and correct password......................passed Then User should get error message please enter valid username..............passed

testcase.classname: Sign in functionality of a dietician website
testcase.name: Forgot password
testcase.system-out: Given Forgot password page..................................................passed When User enters an incorrect OTP...........................................passed Then It should give an error asking user to click resend OTP button.........passed

testcase.name: Verify my patient tab
testcase.system-out: Given User is on any page after login.......................................passed When User clicks on "My Patients" tab.......................................passed Then It shows breadcrubs as Dietician Software MyPatients...................passed

testcase.name: Search Filters
testcase.system-out: Given User is on my patients page...........................................passed When User types in anything other than 0 to 9 in phone number field.........passed Then It must throw error message and discontinue search action..............passed When User types in anything other valid character in email address field....passed Then It must throw error message and discontinue search action..............passed When User types in anything other alphabets in name field...................passed Then It must throw error message and discontinue search action..............passed

testcase.name: Display list of patients
testcase.system-out: Given User is on my patients................................................passed When User clicks on search button with all fields empty.....................passed Then Displays all patients for that dietician only..........................passed

testcase.name: Verify column names
testcase.system-out: Given User is on my patients list...........................................passed When User clicks on search button with or without all fields empty..........passed Then It shows columns name like Record Number CustID and Name and Details and Last Visit and Actions and View Previous Test Report and View Previous Diet Plans and Create New Report or Plan.passed

testcase.name: Verify that page needs pagiation
testcase.system-out: Given Patients record are displayed.........................................passed When Records are more than 10...............................................passed Then It must show pagination links..........................................passed When User clicks on next pagination link....................................passed Then It goes to next page and shows different patients on that page"........passed When User clicks on previous pagination link................................passed Then It goes to previous page...............................................passed

testcase.name: Verify that each patient detail
testcase.system-out: Given User has searched patients............................................passed When Patients records Cust ID are displayed.................................passed Then Customer Id is shown in column Cust ID column..........................passed When Patients records Name are displayed...................................passed Then Patients name is displayed in Name column..............................passed When Patients records are displayed.........................................passed Then Details column shows patients email or phone number or address.........passed When Patients records are valid date displayed..............................passed Then Last visit date is shown in valid date format..........................passed When Patients records valid format are displayed............................passed Then Verify that email address is in valid format in details cloumn.........passed

testcase.name: View pateints diet plans
testcase.system-out: Given Patients records are displayed........................................passed When User clicks on button View Previous Diet Plans.........................passed Then It redirects user to Generated Diet Plans page.........................passed When User clicks on button Create New Report/Plan...........................passed Then It redirects user to Confirm Health Conditions and Generate a New Diet plan page.passed

testcase.name: View patients previous test reports
testcase.system-out: Given Patients records are displayed........................................passed When User clicks on button View Previous Test Reports.......................passed Then It redirects user to View Patient Test Reports page....................passed

testcase.name: Display Patient Test Report page
testcase.system-out: Given Dietician is on the My patients page..................................passed When Enters the patient name in filter and clicks search....................passed Then A record of the given patient is displays here.........................passed When Clicks View Previous Test Reports button...............................passed Then Dietician navigates to View Patient Test Reports page..................passed

testcase.name: View Patient Test Report page
testcase.system-out: Given Dietician is on View Patients Test report page........................passed When Dietician checks the File/Report uploaded in the Confirm health condition and create diet plan page is available in the table.passed Then File/Report displays in the table located in the View Patient Test Reports page.passed When Clicks on the view PDF button of particular patients...................passed Then PDF file opens in separate window......................................passed

testcase.name: View Patient PDF file
testcase.system-out: Given Dietician is on PDF file..............................................passed When Dietician clicks on View PDF button available in the Diet Plan column..passed Then PDF file opens in separate window......................................passed When Dietician checks the Patient Details and Doctor Details and health conditionsa and 7 Days Menu warnings and comments are available in the PDF file.passed Then Patient Details and doctor Details and health conditions and 7 Days Menu and warnings and comments are available in the PDF file.passed

testcase.name: Keeping email box empty
testcase.system-out: Given Sign up with empty field..............................................passed When User leaves email field empty..........................................passed Then It should display an alert to fill up all the mandatory fields.........passed

testcase.system-out: Given Sign up with invalid ph no............................................passed When User puts 7 digit ph no................................................passed Then It should give an alert to user for using a valid ph no for the field..passed

testcase.system-out: Given Sign up with invalid password.........................................passed When User creates shorter password than required............................passed Then User should get an error message password criteria did not match.......passed

testcase.name: Leaving any other field empty
testcase.system-out: Given User on sign up form page.............................................passed When User leaves any other field empty......................................passed Then User should get an error message asking to fill all the boxes..........passed

testcase.name: User search the Patient text
testcase.system-out: Given User is on any page after login.......................................passed When User clicks on My Patients tab.........................................passed Then Name email and phone number filter options and search button are displayed.passed

testcase.name: Verify search button text
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged in.....................................................passed When User is on my patients.................................................passed Then Button used for search has text as Search..............................passed When User starts typing inside name filter box..............................passed Then Text inside name filter box should disappear...........................passed When User starts typing inside email address filter box.....................passed Then Text inside email address filter box should disappear..................passed When User starts typing inside phone number filter box......................passed Then Text inside phone number filter box should disappear...................passed

testcase.name: Search patients by name
testcase.system-out: Given User is on my patients................................................passed When User clicks on search with name phrase into name filter box............passed Then Records for name phrase are shown......................................passed When User clicks on search with email phrase into email address filter......passed Then Records for email phrase are shown.....................................passed When User clicks on search with phone number into phone number filter.......passed Then Records for phone number are shown.....................................passed
